settings_page_description: Manage your account settings and set e-mail preferences.
settings_personal_data_desc: Update your personal details and contact information.
settings_prof_qual_desc: Manage your professional titles, specializations, and qualifications.
settings_practice_info_desc: Update the details for your primary practice or clinic.
settings_save_error_desc: Could not save your changes. Please try again.
settings_personal_data_success_desc: Your personal data has been successfully updated.
settings_prof_qual_success_desc: Your professional qualifications have been successfully updated.
settings_practice_info_success_desc: Your practice information has been successfully updated.
settings_danger_zone_desc: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
settings_delete_dialog_desc_part1: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers, including all uploaded documents.
settings_delete_error_code_mismatch_desc: The confirmation code does not match.
settings_delete_success_desc: Your account has been permanently deleted.
settings_pending_approval_alert: Your account is pending approval. You can review and edit your submitted data or delete your account. Access to other portal features is disabled until your registration is approved.
